From the moment I started remixing ramen noodles into gourmet meals and spending hours watching cooking shows as a puny six-year-old, I knew I found a deep passion for food. While I realized — after taking on a two-year high school internship in an award-winning kitchen — that a…read more

published now

We independently select these products—if you buy from one of our links, we may earn a commission. All prices were accurate at the time of publishing.

I grew up in the late ’90s, so I have a ton of memories of sitting in front of the TV watching Strawberry Shortcake. Honestly, those characters were the original pioneers of the coquette style — way before it became a trend like it is now. So, with this aesthetic making a comeback, it makes perfect sense that Marshalls would drop a kitchen collection inspired by that nostalgic cartoon.

Social media is obsessing over Marshalls’ new Strawberry Shortcake-inspired kitchen collection, with fans racing to the department store to grab the adorable bowls and tumblers starting at just $6. These gems are quickly becoming a must-have for anyone looking to add a nostalgic touch to their home.

The pasta bowls, which have a low and wide profile, make it easier to twirl up mounds of noodles. They’re $6.99 each and feature a design of Strawberry Shortcake adoring Custard, her cute kitten while it plays on a basket full of fruit with a rim adorned with berries and flowers. You can also find tumblers with a similar design, too.

One creator posted about this find on TikTok and fans jetted to the comment section. One person said, “They’re sooo cute, love the bowls,” and another person mentioned, “Ohhhhh my goodness!!! So sweet.”

The bowls aren’t available online, but you can order vintage-inspired Hello Kitty bowls on Marshalls’ website. 

These vintage-inspired Strawberry Shortcake pasta bowls likely won’t last long on the shelves at Marshalls. So, if you spot them, grab a few. Who knows, maybe in the next decade they’ll become a collector’s item for you.

Buy: Hello Kitty Set of 4 Dinner Bowls, $24.99
